props.name: SPACING_MEDIUM
props.comment: For paddings in labels / inline stuff

props.name: SPACING_NORMAL
props.comment: Regular padding for compact tables and such

props.name: SPACING_LARGE
props.comment: Padding for the inside of boxes

props.name: SPACING_X_LARGE
props.comment: Padding between elements and for boxes with larger font-sizes

props.name: SPACING_XX_LARGE
props.comment: Larger padding for when bigger spacing is needed

props.name: SPACING_XXX_LARGE
props.comment: Huge padding we can use for seperation of vertical sections
